metaTitle: Spaghetti Shark — Carb Up. Bite Harder.
metaDescription: The carb-loaded apex predator of crypto. No images, just type and teeth. 0% tax, sauce-first culture.

hero.sub: No images. No fluff. Just noodles and nerve.

narrativeBurst.title: Origin of the Sauce
narrativeBurst.body: A chef dropped an AI pasta reactor into the ocean. Lightning struck. Wheat DNA high-fived a baby shark. Now he eats FUD, slurps liquidity, and burps bullish.

bullishMenu.title: THE MENU
items: ≤5% Treasury • Only if we need ads & noodles
LP & fees per Pump.fun docs (currently 0.015 SOL on graduation)
bullishMenu.disclaimer: High risk. Pasta not profits. Read live docs before you slurp.

community.title: Community Table
community.body: Post your carb-core memes with #SpaghettiShark. No stock pics — only logo, letters, and irresponsible confidence.

roadmapPreview.title: BULLISH MENU SPECIALS

Week 2: Shark Signal — on-chain pings with bite SFX
